name: Lowe's Military Discount
description: 10% off full-priced items with no annual limit
fullDescription: Lowe's offers a year-round 10% military discount on most full-priced items for active duty, veterans, and military spouses, with no annual limit.
whatTheyOffer:
- 10% off most full-priced items
- No annual spending limit
- Free standard shipping for verified members
- Free upgrade to Silver Key status in MyLowe's Rewards
- Available in-store and online
howToGetIt:
1. Visit lowes.com/military to register
2. Verify military status through ID.me
3. Eligible: all US military branches, veterans, spouses
4. Link to MyLowe's Rewards account
5. Give phone number or MyLowe's card at checkout
keywords: Lowe's, military discount, veteran, active duty, 10% off, home improvement, tools, hardware, MyLowes, ID.me
